Npc0405:
ï¿½The information on the back of the ï¿½refreshing herbï¿½ reads as follows:[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you catch a cold, if you're ill, or if you can't seem to heal,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½if you're poisoned, if you're depressed, a refreshing herb is the real deal.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I know, it seems pretty iffy, but you should give it a try![HALT][END]
